name: Basic Craft
desc: You prepare spiritcraft, conducting the hand signs and speaking the words to simplify casting.

abilities.name: Swift Preparation
abilities.effect: Place _Momentum_ on any [_Spirit_] Art or Technique equal to the _Free Hands_ you have.
abilities.boost: No Cost: Add [_Rooted_]. Place an additional _Momentum_ on the same _Art_.

abilities.name: Focused Charge
abilities.effect: Become _Charging_. At the end of the next _Phase_, as a _Slow Action_, place 3 _Momentum_ on any [_Spirit_] Art or Technique plus the _Free Hands_ you have.

name: Basic Metal
desc: Simple techniques that all with a metal companion can easily accomplish.

abilities.name: Metal Shot
abilities.effect: Choose a 0 _Load_ _Metal_ _Item_ that you have _Equipped_/_Wielded_ or is _Unattended_ in your _Arena_. Attack a Target within _Range_, placing the _Equipment_ _Unattended_ in an _Engagement_ with the Target. If you choose _Unattended_ _Equipment_, add [_Remote_].
abilities.special: If the Item used for this has an Attack with _Slash_ or _Stab_ you may replace _Crush_ with said keyword.

boosts.name: Heavy Shot
boosts.effect: You may instead use a _Load_ X piece of _Equipment_, where X is the _Momentum_ paid for this _Boost_. Deal +X Damage and +X _Stun_. If you spend 2 _Momentum_, this is instead a _Balanced_ Attack. If you spend 3, it is instead _Heavy_.

abilities.name: Metalbend
abilities.effect:
Choose one:
* Resolve the Interaction effect of a piece of _Metal_ _Terrain_ within Range, paying its listed _Cost_ - 1.
* Instead, _Wield_ or _Equip_ a _Light_ _Metal_ _Item_ in Range that is _Wielded_/_Equipped_ by a willing target or is _Unattended_. You may instead choose to move it somewhere else within Range, or allow a willing target to _Equip_/_Wield_ the Item.

boosts.name: Heavy Bending
boosts.effect: You may instead _Wield_ or _Equip_ any _Metal_ _Item_, regardless of _Load_.

abilities.name: Second Impact
abilities.effect: Add [_Pierce_ 1] and deal +2 _Damage_. If this Attack had _Thrown_ or moved a piece of _Equipment_ in some way you may place it anywhere within the original effect's _Range_, including _Wielding_ it.

abilities.name: Metal Ward
abilities.effect: Reroll the _Defense Roll_, using the second result.

name: Shift
desc: You dash forward, covering ground across the battlefield.

abilities.name: Run
abilities.effect: Gain _1/2/2/3_ _Temporary_ _Movement_ this _Turn_.

abilities.name: Dig Deep
abilities.effect: Gain 1 _Temporary_ _Movement_ this _Turn_.

name: Fight
desc: You stand strong, unleashing attacks without compromising your position.

abilities.name: Basic Combat
abilities.effect: Use an Attack [_Discount_ _1/2/3/4_].

abilities.name: Opportunity Attack
abilities.trigger: A hostile creature you are _Engaged_ with creates an _Opening_.
abilities.effect: Use a Single-Target Attack [_Discount_ 2] against the triggering creature.

abilities.name: Lethal Blow
abilities.effect: Deal 3 _Bonus_ _Damage_.

abilities.name: Guard Breaker
abilities.effect: Add _Break_ [_Focus_] to the triggering Attack or deal +5 _Bonus Stun_.

name: Sturdy
desc: You are exceptionally tough, pushing through any difficulty with determination and grit.

abilities.name: Power Through
abilities.effect: You may instead _Negate_ with _Grit_ or, if already _Negating_ with _Grit_, _Negate_ with _Advantage_. If you succeed, gain 2 _Vigor_.

abilities.name: Endure
abilities.effect: Instead, set your _Health_ to 1 and/or do not gain _Break_.

name: Envenom
desc: You punctuate an attack with an explosion, disorienting and launching foes.

abilities.name: Injection
abilities.reqs: _Graze_+ with a _Natural_ Weapon and the Attack dealt at least 1 Damage.
abilities.effect: Deal 3 _Bonus Damage_ [_Endurable_] and add _Poisoned_ 1.

name: Evade
desc: The best way to survive on the battlefield is to simply avoid where the danger is.

abilities.name: Cautious Step
abilities.effect: Add [_Safe_] to your _Movement_ this _Turn_.

abilities.name: Sidestep
abilities.trigger: You are Attacked and are not _Immobile_.
abilities.effect:
_Defend_. Gain +1 Reflex. Reduce the Damage by your _Reflex_ plus any _Movement_ spent.
* _Tie_: Instead reduce the damage by your _Reflex_ plus twice the _Movement_ spent.
* _Win_: Instead reduce the damage by your _Reflex_ plus triple the _Movement_ spent.

boosts.name: Roll
boosts.effect: After resolving this Reaction, reduce the triggering Attack's result by one tier (making a _Hit_ a _Graze_, for example). If the _Defend_ was a _Loss_, gain _Prone_.

abilities.name: Quick Step
abilities.effect: _Disengage_; choose one enemy; treat yourself as [_Safe_] against their Attack.

boosts.name: Tumble
boosts.effect: Instead, this is [_Safe_] against all Targets.

name: Martial Arts
desc: You utilize unarmed combat, striking and defending with precision.

abilities.name: Strike
abilities.effect: Attack a Target within Range. As a part of this Attack you may _Prepare_ up to 1 _Momentum_.

boosts.name: Match Point
boosts.effect: On a _Graze_+, deal +2 _Bonus Stun_ and add _Push_ [_Grit_] or deal +1 _Bonus Stun_ and add _Prone_/_Grabbed_ [_Grit_/_Reflex_]

name: Spirit Companion
desc: You call forth your spirit, manifesting their physical form to aid you.

abilities.name: Manifest
abilities.effect:
Choose one:
* _Summon_ your _Spirit_ within a valid _Arena_ within Range.
* _Recall_ your _Spirit_.

abilities.name: Tag Team
abilities.effect: The Target may act as if it is _Phase_ X + Y, where X is the _Momentum_ spent and Y is whatever _Phase_ they would have acted as if it was. This may not allow you to act as if it is later than the current _Phase_.

abilities.name: Combination Strike
abilities.reqs: _Spirit_ is within Range of the original Attack's Target.
abilities.effect: Your Spirit may immediately use a Single-Target Attack [_Discount_ 2] against the same Target.

abilities.name: Interdiction
abilities.effect: You and your Spirit are both targeted by the triggering effect, but take half Damage/_Stun_ each and _Negate_ with _Advantage_.

name: Overwhelming Strength
desc: You unleash your strength, decimating the terrain and flinging creatures away.

abilities.name: Shove
abilities.effect: Inflict _Push_ [5 _Grit_] on a Target within Range. This Attack is always treated as a _Hit_.
abilities.boost: 1 _Momentum_: Add an additional Target. You may repeat this _Boost_.

abilities.name: Fling
abilities.effect: Instead, inflict _Forceful Push_.

abilities.name: Collateral Damage
abilities.effect: Repeat the Attack against an _Obstacle_ at the same _Position_ as the Target, dealing +3 Damage.
abilities.boost: 2 _Momentum_: Use this _Gambit_ even if you did not qualify for one.

abilities.name: Overpower
abilities.effect: Deal +1 _Bonus Damage_ and inflict _Push_ [6 _Grit_]/_Prone_ [4 _Grit_/_Reflex_]/_Sundered_ [4 _Reflex_] on one Target.
abilities.boost: 2 _Momentum_: Use this _Gambit_ even if you did not qualify for one.

name: Brace
desc: You defend yourself, using weapons and armor to keep your foes assault at bay.

abilities.name: Deflect
abilities.effect:
Choose an Attack to _Defend_ with, paying half its _Cost_ (minimum 1).
* **_Loss_**: Gain half the _Defend_ result.
* **Tie+:** Gain the Defend result.

abilities.name: Parry
abilities.effect:
Choose a _Defensive_ Attack to _Defend_ with, paying its _Cost_.
* **_Loss_:** Resolve the _Miss_ effect of the Attack. 
* **_Tie_** Gain half the _Defend_ result.
* **_Win_:** Gain the Defend effect and resolve the Attack against the Target if possible, adding [_Counter_]. If you resolve the Attack, any _Gambits_ earned may be spent on _Defensive_ or _Offensive_ options.

abilities.name: Perfect Guard
abilities.effect: The triggering Attack is [_Glancing_].

name: Rally
desc: Battle is no place for weakness; you grit your teeth, catch your breath, and push on.

abilities.name: Catch Breath
abilities.effect:
Choose one per _Phase_:
* You or the Target _Recovers_.
* You or the Target clears 3 _Stun_.
* Gain 1 _Momentum_.
* _Prepare_ 1 _Momentum_.
* Gain _Guarding_.

abilities.name: Grit Teeth
abilities.effect: Reduce your _Stun_ by 5. You may trigger this before or after resolving the triggering effect.

abilities.name: Press On
abilities.effect: Gain 2 _Momentum_.

name: Seize Opening
desc: Anything on the battlefield is a potentially opening, if you are bold enough to seize it.

name: Interact
desc: Sometimes you need to do things more complicated than just sticking enemies with the pointy end of a stick.

abilities.name: Use Environment
abilities.effect: Resolve the Interaction effect of a piece of _Terrain_ within Range, paying its listed _Cost_.

abilities.name: Drop
abilities.effect: Stop _Wielding_ a piece of _Equipment_, placing it unused in your _Arena_.

boosts.name: Drop Pack
boosts.effect: Create an [_Opening_] and instead remove your _Pack_, placing it unused in your _Arena_.

abilities.name: Draw/Stow
abilities.effect: _Wield_ an _Equipped_ Item, or _Equip_ a  _Wielded_ Item.
abilities.special: Cost is instead 0 if the item is _Light_.

boosts.name: Retrieve
boosts.effect: Create an [_Opening_]. Instead _Wield_ or _Equip_ an _Unattended_ piece of _Equipment_ in your _Engagement_ or, if you paid the cost with _Movement_, an _Unattended_ piece of _Equipment_ in your _Arena_ that is not in an _Engagement_.

boosts.name: Trade
boosts.effect: Choose an ally in your _Engagement_. They may immediately _Wield_ or _Equip_ an Item you have _Wielded_ or _Equipped_, or vice versa. You may use this at no cost by creating an [_Opening_].

abilities.name: Rearm
abilities.effect: Gain _2/3/4/5_ _Temporary_ _Momentum_, which may only be used on [_Armament_] _Enhancements_ and this _Action_.

boosts.name: Rummage
boosts.effect: Create an [_Opening_]. This _Turn_ you may target _Packed_ _Equipment_ with [_Armament_] _Enhancements_.

name: Manuever
desc: You use mobility and guile to outmaneuver your foe, forcing openings.

abilities.name: Press Advantage
abilities.effect: Use 2 _Momentum_ of _Boosts_ from the original Attack or this _Gambit_.

boosts.name: Flowing Combo
boosts.effect: _Prepare_ 1 on the Attack used for this Gambit. You may repeat this _Boost_ up to twice.

abilities.name: Feint
abilities.effect: A Target within Range must immediately _Negate_ [5 _Focus_]. If they fail, you gain a +1 _Bonus_ on your next _Attack_ against them this _Turn_.
abilities.special: If you paid the cost with _Movement_, the Target instead _Negates_ with _Reflex_.

abilities.name: Flank
abilities.trigger: A hostile creature within Range is Attacked.
abilities.effect: The Target must immediately _Negate_ [5 _Focus_]. If they fail, the Attacker gains a +1 _Bonus_.
abilities.special: If you paid the cost with _Movement_, the Target instead _Negates_ with _Reflex_.
